Member Function Documentation

double CytogeneticsTrioAnalysis::calculateLODPaternity ( std::vector< char > &  vSampleGenotypeCalls,
std::vector< char > &  vKnownMotherGenotypeCalls,
std::vector< char > &  vAllegedFatherGenotypeCalls,
std::vector< float > &  vProbabilityAAlleles,
std::vector< float > &  vProbabilityBAlleles,
double  dErrorRate = 0.05 
)

Some Trio Analysis functions for Cytogenetics.

Calculate the LOD (Likelihood of odds) value for the paternity test with both parents. Note: all the vectors input to this function must be of the same length. One element per marker.

Parameters:
vSampleGenotypeCalls - std::vector<char> where -1 = No Call, 0 = AA, 1 = AB, and 2 = BB.
vKnownParentGenotypeCalls - std::vector<char> where -1 = No Call, 0 = AA, 1 = AB, and 2 = BB.
vAllegedParentGenotypeCalls - std::vector<char> where -1 = No Call, 0 = AA, 1 = AB, and 2 = BB.
vProbabilityAAlleles - std::vector<float> The probability of the AAllele occurring in the population.
vProbabilityBAlleles - std::vector<float> The probability of the BAllele occurring in the population.
dErrorRate - The error rate associated with this calculation (defaults to 0.05).
Returns:
- The calculated LOD score.

double  dErrorRate = 0.05

Calculate the LOD (Likelihood of odds) value for the paternity test with one parent.

Note: all the vectors input to this function must be of the same length. One element per marker.

Parameters:
vSampleGenotypeCalls - std::vector<char> where -1 = No Call, 0 = AA, 1 = AB, and 2 = BB.
vAllegedParentGenotypeCalls - std::vector<char> where -1 = No Call, 0 = AA, 1 = AB, and 2 = BB.
vProbabilityAAlleles - std::vector<float> The probability of the AAllele occurring in the population.
vProbabilityBAlleles - std::vector<float> The probability of the BAllele occurring in the population.
dErrorRate - The error rate associated with this calculation (defaults to 0.05).
Returns:
- The calculated LOD score.
